border--b-solid.title: Solid bottom border
border--b-solid.description: Gives the bottom border a solid line.

border--b-dashed.title: Dashed bottom border
border--b-dashed.description: Gives the bottom border a dashed line.

border--b-dotted.title: Dotted bottom border
border--b-dotted.description: Gives the bottom border a dotted line.

border--b-double.title: Double bottom border
border--b-double.description: Gives the bottom border a double line.

border--b-groove.title: Groove bottom border
border--b-groove.description: Gives the bottom border a groove.

border--b-ridge.title: Ridge bottom border
border--b-ridge.description: Gives the bottom border a ridge.

border--b-inset.title: Inset bottom border
border--b-inset.description: Gives the bottom border an inset.

border--b-outset.title: Outset bottom border
border--b-outset.description: Gives the bottom border an outset.
